content: any way 5 ○ m1r sm p1 sm m1l ○ knitting with the main pattern to the next sm ○ m1r sm p1 sm m1l ○ k to the end with the main pattern ● rs row 3 ○ k to one stitch before the sm with the main pattern ○ m1r sm k1 sm m1l ○ knitting with the main pattern to the next sm ○ m1r sm k1 sm m1l ○ knit with 2k 1p pattern to 1 stitch before the sm ○ m1r sm k1 sm m1l ○ knitting with the main pattern to the next sm ○ m1r sm k1 sm m1l ○ k to the end with the main pattern ● ws row 4 ○ k to the next sm with the main pattern ○ m1r sm p1 sm m1l ○ knitting with the main pattern to the next sm ○ m1r p1 sm m1l ○ knit with 2k 1p pattern to the next sm ○ m1r sm p1 sm m1l ○ knitting with the main pattern to the next sm ○ m1r sm p1 sm m1l ○ k to the end with the main pattern now you have 231 248 254 271 275 292 stitches on your needle repeat row 3 and row 4 4 5 6 7 8 9 times more do not forget the v-neck increasing in every 4 th row now you have 299 334 356 389 411 446 stitches on your needle tip you can count the row or make some notes in the following table rs ws rs ws body now you have to distribute your piece for the body and for the two sleeves knit with the main pattern to the first sm to your first raglan stitch place the stitches which are between the two raglan stitches to a stitch holder or scrap yarn cast on 4 5 7 7 7 7 stitches for underarm and continue knitting the back part with the main pattern to the next sm second sleeve first raglan stitch place the stitches which are between the two raglan stitches to a stitch holder or scrap yarn again and cast on 4 5 7 7 7 7 stitches for underarm finish the row with the rest of the stitches with the main pattern do not forget the v-neck increasing in every 4 th row you have to count that in the whole peace this will give you the wrapped design lolbert-szabó júlia ©copyright 2024 instagram @lsz_juli this pattern is for personal non-commercial use only the pattern may not be copied resold or redistributed in any way 6 continue knitting the row with tha main pattern up to 24 24 26 26 28 28 cm from the underarm or desired length tip you can count the row or make some notes in the following table rs ws rs ws when you finish do not bind off the stitches leave all stitches on the needles or on a stitch holder sleeves put the stitches on
